overview: On St. Patrick's Day, the world goes green. But who inspired this global celebration - was he a man, a true saint or a glorious Irish myth? Patrick, Pagans and Party Animals is about the life, legend and amazing legacy of St. Patrick of Ireland, a 5th Century priest whose zealous missionary work gives rise to one of the world's most high-spirited annual celebrations.
title: Patrick, Pagans and Party Animals
